item.title: Can’t go to PDC 2008, watch the videos on Channel 9 and on the PDC 2008 site
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: So you think you missed out because you were not able to go to the Microsoft Professional Developers Conference, think again, the only thing you won’t get by visiting these two links is the hard drive that they gave to the attendees There are 16 pages of videos on Channel 9 Videos on Channel 9: […]
item.content:encoded:
So you think you missed out because you were not able to go to the Microsoft Professional Developers Conference, think again, the only thing you won’t get by visiting these two links is the hard drive that they gave to the attendees

There are 16 pages of videos on Channel 9
Videos on Channel 9: http://channel9.msdn.com/tags/PDC2008/

PDC2008 site: http://microsoftpdc.com/
